System Requirements

Minimum Requirements

Processor: Intel i5-8400 / AMD Ryzen 5 2600
Memory: 8 GB RAM
Graphics: GTX 1060 6GB / RX 580 8GB
OS: Windows 10 64-bit
Storage: 50 GB available space

Recommended Requirements

Processor: Intel i7-10700K / AMD Ryzen 7 3700X
Memory: 16 GB RAM
Graphics: RTX 3070 / RX 6700 XT
OS: Windows 11 64-bit
Storage: 50 GB SSD space

Ultimate Experience

Processor: Intel i9-12900K / AMD Ryzen 9 5900X
Memory: 32 GB RAM
Graphics: RTX 4080 / RX 7800 XT
OS: Windows 11 64-bit
Storage: 100 GB NVMe SSD

Ultimate Features:

  • Ray Tracing Ultra
  • 4K 60+ FPS
  • Spatial Audio
  • Enhanced VFX

Development Progress

Stay updated on the latest development milestones

September 2025

Core Magic System

Implemented all 6 magic disciplines with web integration. Spell effects and combat mechanics finalized.

August 2025

Character Models & Animation

High-fidelity character models for Skulduggery, Valkyrie, and other main characters completed with motion capture.

October 2025

World Building & Environments

Creating detailed environments for Dublin, the Sanctuary, and Academy locations with Nanite virtualized geometry.

75% Complete
November 2025

Multiplayer & Networking

Implementing multiplayer systems for cooperative story mode and competitive magical duels.

December 2025

Beta Testing Launch

Closed beta testing begins for registered community members. First public gameplay demonstrations.

Q2 2026

Full Release

Complete game launch across all platforms with story campaign, multiplayer, and web integration features.
